titleStmt.title: Loves riddle A pastorall comædie; written, at the time of his being Kings scholler in Westminster Schoole, by A. Cowley.
titleStmt.author: Cowley, Abraham, 1618-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Dawson, for Henry Seile, and are to be sold at the Tygres head in Fleet-street over against St. Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the Tygres head in Fleet-street over against St. Dunstans Church
